mapper.select: SELECT o.takeoutId, o. NAME name, sum(o.scattered_num) scatteredNum, sum(o.sum) numZ, sum(o.number) number, sum(o.weight) weightSum, sum(o.volume) volumeSum, CEILING(sum(o.tray)) tray FROM ( SELECT d.takeout_id takeoutId, s. CODE, d.item_id item_id, i. NAME, sum(d.whole_num) sum, sum(d.scattered_num) scattered_num, sum(d.number) number, CEILING(sum(d.number) / i.unit_rate) * i.item_weight weight, CEILING(sum(d.number) / i.unit_rate) * i.item_volume volume, CEILING(sum(d.number) / i.unit_rate) / i.tray tray FROM stock_takeout_detail d LEFT JOIN material_item_clientitem i ON d.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN stock_takeout s ON d.takeout_id = s.id GROUP BY d.takeout_id, d.item_id ) o where o.takeoutId = #{takeoutId} GROUP BY o.takeoutId
